channel.title: post on Young-ISA
channel.description: Recent content in post on Young-ISA

item.title: Clustering Big Data with Mixed Features
item.description: Joshua Tobin from the School of Computer Science & Statistics, Trinity College Dublin, will introduce a new clustering method for large mixed attribute datasets which adapts and extends the popular peak-finding technique. The algorithm presented is competent at deciding the correct number of clusters and executes with subquadratic complexity.

item.title: Global Short-Term Forecasting of Covid-19 Cases
item.description: Dr. Thiago de Paula Oliveira from the Roslin Institute, University of Edinburgh will speak on a new modelling framework of COVID-19 to forecast the number of cases, study the effects of covariates (such as lockdown policies), and generate forecasts for smaller regions within countries and up to six days ahead.

item.title: Young-ISA Twitter Poster Conference (#YISAPoster2020)
item.description: This Twitter Poster Conference aims to provide an opportunity for Statisticians and Data Scientists around the world to meet online, share their research and engage in scientific discussion

item.title: Inaugural Young-ISA Meeting
item.description: This inaugural event will gather together early career statisticians from across Ireland for a series of talks on career development in academia and industry
